cleaned_text: Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules Description Vibel capsule is a nutritional supplement. It contains multivitamins and multi-minerals. It is used to treat & prevent vitamin and mineral deficiencies. It boosts immunity and also helps improve over all health & wellbeing. Vitamins and minerals are the essential components of the body. They are crucial for performing physiological functions of the body optimally. Helps maintain appetite, metabolism, brain functions and improves overall maintenance and development in the body. They are also crucial for the proper functioning of the brain, nerves, blood cells, muscles, hormones, etc. They also protect the body from damage and strengthen the immune system. Help maintain integral structures such as skin, hairs, nails, bones, teeth, etc. Take Vibel capsule as advised by the doctor. Product Summary |Offer Vitamin E / Tocopherol(1.0 Mg) + Calcium Pantotherate(1.0 Mg) + Vitamin B12 / Mecobalamin / Cynocobalamin / Mcg) + Vitamin / Pyridoxine(0.5 Mg) + Iodine(0.075 Mg) + Sodium Molybdate(0.1 Mg) + Vitamin B1 / Thiamine(1.0 Mg) + Vitamin D3 / Cholecalciferol(100.0 Iu) + Vitamin B3 / Nicotinic Acid / Niacin(15.0 Mg) + Magnesium(3.0 Mg) + Elemental Phosphorus(58.0 Mg) + Vitamin B2 / Riboflavin(1.0 Mg) + Manganese(0.5 Mg) + Vitamin C / Ascorbic Acid(2.5 Mg) + Potassium Sulphate(2.0 Mg) + Vitamin B9 / Folic Acid / Folate(50.0 Mcg) + Elemental Calcium(75.0 Mg) + Vitamin A / Retinol(100.0 Iu)| Uses of Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules - Vibel capsule is used for the treatment and prevention of vitamin and mineral deficiencies. - It helps to boost the immunity of the body and improves overall well-being - It supports healthy joints, bones, skin, hair and proper brain functions. - It has excellent antioxidant properties protects the body from damage. - It improves overall metabolism and the physiological functions of the body. Precautions and Warnings of Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules Other General Warnings - You are pregnant, breastfeeding or have any existing medical condition like diabetes, hypertension, kidney or liver problem, etc be sure to consult your doctor. - You are on other medications, supplements or following any complementary or integrative health approaches. - You should not take the Vibel capsule if you are allergic to any of its components. - You are going to undergo any surgery or operation. - Nutritional supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and should not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. Ingredients and Benefits of Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules - Vibel capsule contains multivitamins and a blend of minerals. - Multivitamins - It contains vitamins A, E, C, D3, B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B9 and B12 which play an essential role in the proper functioning of the nervous and immune system, heart muscles and for the release of energy from protein, fat and carbohydrate, needed for growth, normal appetite and digestion and is also required for regulating blood cells. It is also essential for reproduction, maintenance, growth and regulation of bodily processes.... - Multi-minerals - It contains zinc, copper, iodine, sodium molybdate, magnesium, elemental phosphorus, manganese, potassium sulphate, elemental calcium which play a major role in the functioning of the heart, immune system, thyroid hormones, reproduction and DNA synthesis, breakdown of fats and carbohydrates and is essential for normal growth, wound healing and sexual maturation. It has antioxidant properties and is an integral part of many enzymes in the synthesis of carbohydrates, lipids, nucleic acids and protein.... Directions for Use of Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules - Take Vibel capsule as directed by your doctor. - Do not consume it more than that recommended. Storage and disposal of Vibel Strip Of 10 Capsules - Vibel capsules should be stored in a clean and dry place protected from direct sunlight, moisture and heat. - Keep it out of the reach of children and pets.
